item.description: The Invisible Bridge by Julie Orringer An historical fiction that is a grand love story set against the backdrop of Budapest & Paris. An epic tale of 3 brothers whose lives are ravaged by war, & the chronicle of 1 family's struggle against the forces that threaten to annihilate it. Named Best Book of the Year by the Christian Science Monitor, Boston Glabe & Washington Post. You must register for the book discussion at (617)965-5226. There is no fee.
item.name: Exciting New Book Club Event Open to All
